paragraphs.content: The Contractor shall be liable for any and all damage incurred by the Principal that is directly caused by a breach of this Agreement by the Contractor.

The Principal shall not be liable to the Contractor or the Manager for any material or immaterial damage suffered by either party as a result of, or in connection with, the Contractor's performance of its obligations under this Agreement.
The Principal shall not be liable for any indirect, consequential, or incidental damages, including but not limited to loss of profits, revenue, or goodwill.
The exclusions and limitations set out in this Clause {{ liability_clause_idx }} shall not apply to:

subparagraphs.content: any damage resulting from a breach of Clause {{ company_property_clause_idx }} (Company Property) or Clause {{ confidentiality_clause_idx }} (Confidentiality);
damage caused by gross negligence or willful misconduct.
